newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: TranzRail lifts fares for ferries, trains.
newsitem.headline: TranzRail lifts fares for ferries, trains.

text.p: Tranz Rail said on Wednesday it would lift its retail fares for The Interislander, the Lynx and Tranz Scenic services from July 1.

Tranz Scenic long distance train fares will rise between three and 10 percent. The Overlander (Wellington-Auckland) day time train fare will increase by NZ$6, while the standard adult fare on the TranzAlpine will rise by $2.

Child fares on the Interislander, the Lynx and Tranz Schenic will rise to 60 percent of the standard adult fare from 50 percent. Standard adult fares on The Interislander ferry will rise by $2 and car fares by $5.
TranzRail had no comment on the expected impact of the fare changes on revenue.
